title.bibl: La Parola dei Socialisti, Oct. 31, 1908. [Meeting to Discuss Project for Co-Operative Store]

div.bibl: La Parola dei Socialisti, Oct. 31, 1908. [MEETING TO DISCUSS PROJECT FOR CO-OPERATIVE STORE]

body.p: On Saturday, October 24, the Italian section of the nineteenth ward held its special meeting as advertised, in which the project for a cooperative store, something entirely new in Chicago, was discussed and approved of in outline. Eighty dollars' worth of shares were subscribed for at the same meeting.
